column4: Hi, I'm trying to install ubuntu on my pc and I went out and got a brand sew 80 gig hard drive just for it, but I get an error "Failed to stqart the Xserver (your graphical interface). It is likely that is is not set up correctly. Would you like to view Xserver output to diagnose the problem" and it is frozen up so i cant choose yea or no.
I have an integrated nvidea gforce 4 and a pci ati readeon 9250
let me check the box to make sure, StraightShootinC
so does anyone know how to fix the error?
My monitor isn't plugged into my nvidia port and the integrated nvidia geforce4 isn't even installed
I have the same gfx card as you..I can help you PM me
i can't pm you. It says I'm not registered
I removed my linux partition, now alll i have is one windows partition.
All I need to do is remove GRUB
Through ubuntu: How can I remove GRUB?
